name: Clicker Settlers - Archived
description:
Clicker Settlers - Archived

Also previously called Clicker Settler, It’s a combination of an idle game and classic real-time strategies made in late-90s to early 00s. Clicker Settlers utilizes classic RTS mechanics to deliver modern, mobile on-the-go experience. In 2018, in peak periods reached popularity of around 1000 active users at any period of time and over 5 thousands downloads a day. We consider Clicker Settlers to be a huge success, considering it was made to be an university project made completely by one person. In total, the game was downloaded 40 thousand times.

At the moment, no updates are planned.

Some bugs are still present.

You can get the final version here, for free.
